chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem:

The phone just turned off. I couldn't even see how it went out, it was as if someone had shut down an old TV. I've been searching online and tried several keyboard combinations, unfortunately nothing worked and the phone still doesn't turn on.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
